policies.returnPolicy: You can return any product within 7 days of delivery as long as it is unused and in its original packaging. Refunds will be processed within 5–7 business days.
policies.exchangePolicy: Products can be exchanged within 7 days of delivery for size or defect issues, subject to availability.
policies.shippingPolicy: We offer free shipping on orders above ₹999. Orders are dispatched within 24–48 hours and delivered within 3–5 business days.
policies.cancellationPolicy: Orders can be canceled within 2 hours of placement. Once the order is shipped, it cannot be canceled.
policies.paymentMethods: We accept Credit/Debit cards, UPI, Net Banking, and Cash on Delivery (COD).
policies.privacyPolicy: Your personal data is secure with us. We do not share your information with third parties without consent.
policies.supportPolicy: For any issues or queries, our customer support is available 24/7 through chat or email at support@vogueai.shop.

contactInfo.address: VOGUE AI HQ, Hyderabad, Telangana, India
